reviews: I ordered uber it was 3 meals unless they sent me incomplete the order the soda was horrible you have to check the soda machine before sell that, then I found that hamburger I couldn’t eat that I payed for that, really bad I’m pretty sure I am not the only one that receive bad service

Horrible!!!!….I placed an order for almost $75 and it was 4 hamburgers and 4 orders of fries, plus some chicken nuggets with fries….and only 2 hamburgers and two orders of fries arrived!….

Shameful!!!…and the person who provides home delivery and the people who work there don’t even check to see if the order is complete or not!!!…

The delivery guy hands me a bag with two hamburgers and two orders of fries and thinks it's worth 74 dollars!!!...and he's a man and he tells me: that's what they gave me...what an idiot!!!!!

Best burger King location I've been to. Parking was accessible which is usually frustrating to find in downtown areas. Food came fast, and with certain deals, it was very affordable at 14 dollars for 4 people to eat until full. The cashier Paola was very patient with us when we changed our order. Food was good as well. Highly recommend 👍

I tried to order a #4 without ketchup or mayo. Easy enough. One would think!! After a few tries, he then tells me to pull up to the window to order. I’m done. As hangry as I am, I rather drive the hour home & make my own meal.

Go through the drive thru, pull up to window. Give me the wrong food because it was going to take a few minutes longer for what I ordered. Call her out, gets an attitude and gives me half cooked food and starts laughing with the other person because she got caught giving the wrong food and someone complained. I wouldn't go here when the sun is out. The night time people are great. And check your food. If it's going to take an extra 2 minutes they'll give you whatever to get you to leave. The parking lot is filled with scooters and they all stair you down and give you dirty looks. Like a hang out for for undesirables. Place used to be nice.
